articles.author: Victoria Richards
articles.title: It’s 4 July – but the US has nothing to celebrate this Independence Day
articles.description: Roe v Wade, school shootings and the January 6 insurrection. I don’t think there’s much for the ‘land of the free’ to be proud of
articles.content:
